author: hugo_delacruz
content:
Is there any special flag to fill that kind of tests?

I'm getting this error:

```
Error: StateTestFiller convertion error: Unexpected field 'data' in config: StateTestInFiller validInvalid
"validInvalid" : {
    "_info" : {
        "comment" : "Test various examples to see if they are valid or invalid.\nImplements\n# >@f1\nEOF1V0001  code with branches having the same stack height\n# <@f1\n"
    },
    "data" : [
        ":label valid :raw 0x\n  # EOF Initcode\n  EF001  # Magic and Version ( 1 )\n  010004 # Types length ( 4 )\n  020001 # Total code sections ( 1 )\n    000c # Code section  0 , 12  bytes\n  030048 # Data section length ( 36 )\n      00 # Terminator (end of header)\n         #
```

I'm using the same `geth` and `retesteth` commits as the indicated in the already filled tests: https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/aa6d8cfc5d5b4a1658d7fcb1a8fad44bf00336c1/EOFTests/efExample/validInvalid.json#L5-L6

cc <@439556036647714817>

author: dimitry8570
content:
Hm. Which is cmd line?
It must be -t EOFTests

author: hugo_delacruz
content: the filler has to be in the EOFTest directory?

author: hugo_delacruz
content:
Ok, now I'm getting a different error: Seems like retesteth is sending the flag `--output.errorlog` to `evm t8n`, but this flag is not expected by the t8n tool:

```
flag provided but not defined: -output.errorlog
/home/hugo/.retesteth/default/start.sh --state.fork Shanghai --state.reward -1 --input.alloc /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/alloc.json --input.txs /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/txs.rlp --input.env /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/env.json --output.basedir /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b --output.result out.json --output.alloc outAlloc.json --output.errorlog /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/error.json
Err:

Response test_setChainParams: The command '/home/hugo/.retesteth/default/start.sh --state.fork Shanghai --state.reward -1 --input.alloc /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/alloc.json --input.txs /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/txs.rlp --input.env /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/env.json --output.basedir /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b --output.result out.json --output.alloc outAlloc.json --output.errorlog /dev/shm/0e6f9ea2-ebdb-41e7-9901-2649ea75702b/error.json' exited with 256 code.
Finishing retesteth run
*** Total Tests Run: 0
```

Using this command: `retesteth -t EOFTests -- --testpath /home/hugo/workspace/tests/ --filltests --verbosity 6`
